nodes.text: Star Wars Style: Costumes for a Galaxy Far, Far Away

Star Wars Style: Costumes for a Galaxy Far, Far Away is an article about the reference book Star Wars Costumes: The Original Trilogy, with a preview showing some of the costumes worn in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. It appeared in Star Wars Insider 153, and was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016..
